name: Loaded Dice (Plague of Minds)
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULL SCREEN!

Welcome to Loaded Dice! A rouge-like where you have dicey odds of survival. Run, jump, and shoot through a randomized dungeon set as a game board. Find many unique upgrades that will dramatically change your gun's bullets.

This is a game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. The theme was "Roll the Dice," and we used this as the basis for the mechanics in our game. You roll a dice to traverse a dungeon arranged as a game board. Your upgrades and abilities are based around a dice that constantly spins.
